title: whats up with leaver buster
body: my friend was afk in my ranked game coz of his shitty computer and made us lose 100% his fault but after the game we tried to search for a norms then it said he was in leaver buster sumthing and had to wait 10 mins soo we waited then it started searching for norm queue but his client backed him out of queue for some reason and the leaverbuster reset soo we have to wait another 10 mins?? why is that

replies.body: ive been given a five game leavers buster not because i left on purpose but because the league client actually crashed before i got into the game, it came up with some bugsplat thing, said to send a report so i did and still had to restart my comp now this happened bout three times in a row. i personally don think being reported and game bans is fair cause it wasnt my fault either, like most of these posts about this. whole heartedly dont agree with people leaving mid game cause theyre losing or rage quitting but when the server actually %%%%s itself tis a bit rough.

Leavebuster has been having issues lately with it's punishments. Most commonly, the timer resets right as it expires.

Nothing to do but wait for the next patch, or avoid going afk in a public match.
